sentences.english: Brussels is also centrally located in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 布魯塞爾也位於歐洲的中心。

sentences.english: One reason the city is so popular is easy access to the rest of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 布魯塞爾如此受歡迎的一個原因是這裏的四通八達。

sentences.english: A city of north-central Belgium north-northeast of Brussels.
sentences.chinese: 比利時中北部城市，位於布魯塞爾東北偏北。

sentences.english: He then opened tea rooms inGhent, Blankenberge and Brussels.
sentences.chinese: 後來，在根特，布蘭肯貝赫以及布魯塞爾開了茶室。

sentences.english: Ec minister meet today in brussels.
Mr. A an is meeting Friday in Bru els with European Union foreign ministers.
sentences.chinese: 安南星期五在布魯塞爾與歐盟外長舉行會談。

sentences.english: His name is Bruiser. Do you want to hold him?
sentences.chinese: 他叫布魯塞爾。想抱他嗎？

sentences.english: With its headquarters in Brussels, the FISU was founded in 1949.
sentences.chinese: 成立於1949年，其總部設在布魯塞爾。

sentences.english: Brussels is the political heart of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 布魯塞爾是歐洲的政治中心。

sentences.english: Slobodan Lekic in Brussels contributed to this report.
sentences.chinese: 米洛舍維奇在布魯塞爾Lekic促成了這一報告。

sentences.english: The ban’s been imposed by the European Commission in Brussels.
sentences.chinese: 這個禁令在布魯塞爾由歐洲委員會強行實施。

sentences.english: An art gallery in Rotterdam, and later moved to Brussels.
sentences.chinese: 在鹿特丹開畫廊，後來遷到布魯塞爾。

sentences.english: All three of the Owen women were on the plane bound for Brussels. (para. 3)
sentences.chinese: 歐文家的三員女將都在去布魯塞爾的航班上。

sentences.english: Chinese officials in Brussels didn't return calls seeking comment. The U.
sentences.chinese: 布魯塞爾的中國官員沒有回覆尋求置評的電話。

sentences.english: To Paris and you can go to Brussels, and that's it at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 去巴黎，你可以去布魯塞爾，現在只能去這兩個地方。

sentences.english: It operate the stock markets in Amsterdam, Brussles, Listben and Paris.
sentences.chinese: 其股票市場包括阿姆斯特丹，布魯塞爾。
